query:
SELECT 
  pc.categoryId,
  c.name as category_name,
  c.slug,
  c.parentId,
  COUNT(*) as product_count
FROM product_categories pc
LEFT JOIN categories c ON pc.categoryId = c.id
GROUP BY pc.categoryId, c.name, c.slug, c.parentId
ORDER BY product_count DESC;
